reviewText: Jean Ferrat has a beautiful voice,sings very clearly,and wrote some of the most beautiful french classics songs."La montagne" was his first hit,follow by many others ,"Ma mome","Deux enfants au soleil","Nuits et brouillards","Que serai-je sans toi" ect...Jacques Brel , Georges Brassens,Leo Ferre,and Jean Ferrat,all wrote beautiful, classic french songs,with their own style,very different from one another,yet if you like one of them,you'll love them all. Enjoy it !
